verses.name: Isaiah 42:1
verses.text: Behold my servant, whom I uphold; mine elect, in whom my soul delighteth; I have put my spirit upon him: he shall bring forth judgment to the Gentiles.

verses.name: Isaiah 42:2
verses.text: He shall not cry, nor lift up, nor cause his voice to be heard in the street.

verses.name: Isaiah 42:3
verses.text: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.

verses.name: Isaiah 42:4
verses.text: He shall not fail nor be discouraged, till he have set judgment in the earth: and the isles shall wait for his law.
